alert.note: Alert for Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:23AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hamilton, southwestern Merrick, south central Howard and northern Hall Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 622 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cairo, or 10 miles northwest of Grand Island, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alda around 635 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Grand Island and Phillips. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 314 and 334. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
